channel.title: Brexit on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Brexit on PepsFeeder

item.title: Brexit agreement definitively validated by Parliament
item.description: The text, which regulates the terms of the divorce, must still be promulgated by Queen Elizabeth II, possibly as early as Thursday, to have the force of law.

item.title: Brexit Project moves up a gear
item.description: British lawmakers voted for Boris Johnson’s Brexit bill paving the way for Britain’s exit from the European Union on January 31. The newly elected British parliament voted, in principle, for Boris Johnson’s Brexit project.

item.title: Brexit agreement sees the light
item.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson said that the negotiators of the United Kingdom and the European Union were able to reach a “new and great agreement” on Britain’s exit from the bloc.
